data.title: Athena Bitcoin Launches Black Friday Promotion to Save 10% on Bitcoin Purchases This Holiday Season
data.description: One-day promotion encourages consumers to consider Bitcoin as a unique and forward-thinking gift through accessible and safe kiosks MIAMI, FL / ACCESS Newswire / November 26, 2025 / Athena Bitcoin Global (OTCID:ABIT) (“Athena” or the “Company”), the third largest global operator of Bitcoin kiosks and digital asset fintech solutions, today announced a special Black Friday […]
data.author: Athena Bitcoin Global
